website_summaries.verdict: These breathable, moisture-wicking support socks can be worn with open toed shoes and can blend in with your skin tone.
pros: Targeted support for plantar fascia ligament
Power support technology gives targeted foot, heel, arch and ankle support without restricting motion
Thin enough to wear with many styles of shoes
cons: May be too tight for some with swollen ankles
better for arch pain that people with multiple foot problems

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic fit & perfect compression
customer_reviews.text: These compression sleeves work fantastic !! I have heel bone spurs , Achilles tendonitis and other foot issues. these sleeves applied the appropriate amount of compression to needed areas. I wear a 7 1/2 shoe and the s/m sleeves were perfect. I was a little hesitant when initially inspecting the sleeves as they looked so small. They fit perfectly! I highly recommend these sleeves and my only regret is I didn't buy two pair the first order .
customer_reviews.author: Connie

customer_reviews.title: I'm so sorry to have to give a bad review. I received them yesterday and wore one ...
customer_reviews.text: I'm so sorry to have to give a bad review. I received them yesterday and wore one of them last night with sandals. They felt good at first and looked fine with my sandals. I also wore one on my foot during the night, but about 4 a.m. I woke up with excruciating pain in my right foot. I got up and took it off and the terrible pain went away instantly. I don't know what is wrong with my foot but I'm going to be forced to go to the doctor and find out. Good service and I'm sure they will help other people, just the wrong thing for me I guess. I am going to have to return.
customer_reviews.author: Blondy

customer_reviews.title: Helps relieve my plantar fasciitis pain and great customer care from the seller
customer_reviews.text: I've purchased several "socks" to help ease the pain of my plantar fasciitis but these are the ones I use most often. They are comfortable to get on and off and comfortable on my feet. Customer service and support from Profect was excellent! They contacted me to see how they were working for me and quickly responded to any questions or comments. And since this purchase included a pair, it was a better value than most others. I would recommend this product to any who need extra arch support or help with plantar fasciitis pain.
customer_reviews.author: C. S. K.

customer_reviews.title: We were more than impressed by manufacturer's  presence!
customer_reviews.text: The most amazing thing was the manufacturer's willingness to help! My feet were swollen from an arthritic attack and I simply could not get these socks on to my feet over the heels! The company wrote to me several times about replacing them or refunding my cost. I have still not been able to put them on over the heels, although I have no with my regular compression stockings. I wanted these to wear with my leg wraps, where my feet are not covered. I was sent the larger pair, without having to return the smaller pair. My shoe size is 8.5 USA. I am so sorry I have been unable to use these socks.
customer_reviews.author: delraybuzz

customer_reviews.title: Plantar Fasciitis Relief
customer_reviews.text: I had never worn any type of compression socks/stockings so this was a new experience. First of all it takes strength to pull them on (LOL)! Once on they do their work. I developed Plantar Fasciitis for the first time in my life about 3 weeks ago. I have done all the exercises suggested and purchased insoles and these support socks. I've finally arrived at a tolerable level of discomfort. I'm hoping with repeating the exercising/massaging, wearing the insoles & compression socks, I will finally be rid of this most unwelcome disruption in my life.
customer_reviews.author: Jann

customer_reviews.title: Nice weight
customer_reviews.text: I bought a pair for our trip to Europe. I don’t want my planters fasciitis to flare up with all the walking I’ll be doing. I tried it on & like that it’s not too tight. For reference, I’m normally a size 7 & have a narrow to medium width feet & I got a size small. It comes right to my toes. My daughter wears a 7- 7 1/2, has a wider foot than I & said it was too tight on her. The only thing I would change is the open toe. I think wearing this with a sock would feel weird. I’ll write a post vacation review & share how it works.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron Lilak

customer_reviews.title: Best Plantar Fasciitis Socks on the Market!
customer_reviews.text: These are the best compression socks I've had so far for plantar fasciitis. My feet were better compressed than other brands I've tried and I did not have any heal pain in the morning. Not even the slightest bit of discomfort, which I've experienced with other brands. These compression socks are well made and provide excellent support.
customer_reviews.author: G. Mondragon

customer_reviews.title: Smooth, with no seams
customer_reviews.text: These compression "socks" are perfect. They have no seams to trouble your skin and slip on and off easily while giving maximum support. You get two in the package, so it's a great value. I bought the size small. The package lists it as S/M. At first I thought they were too small, but they expand quite a bit. I wear a woman's size 6.5 shoe. If you are a woman who wears a size 8 or higher, you will definitely need a larger size. I wouldn't want them to be any smaller.
customer_reviews.author: Judy H

customer_reviews.title: Best support, a must have healing aid
customer_reviews.text: Yes yes yes! Get these if your feet are killing you! My left foot was the hurt foot (plantar fasciitis from stepping on a lego) but I wore them in both to help with the healing. On the really bad days I could wear these under compression socks. Happy to say that after months of foot pain my foot is finally feeling like normal! Thank you very much for your product, it was a great buy to help me heal up faster. Great quality and value.
customer_reviews.author: Erin H.

customer_reviews.title: Good arch support
customer_reviews.text: I was having “arch support” pain in my left foot and I was having problems walking. Many years ago I Philadelphia, I saw a foot doctor who told me I had a arch problem. He tapped my foot (something like this sock would do). After a week of using this sock, my pain is gone. I believe it supported my stretched tendons which was causing the pain and gave the tendons a chance to heal. I know that if I should ever feel that arch pain come on again, I should use the sock for a week or so and never let it get to that unbearable pain again.
customer_reviews.author: Ambs

customer_reviews.title: Not just for Plantar Fasciitis!
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful! Thank you very much! I do not have Plantar Fasciitis, but have a rolling ligament that sometimes very painfully moves and rests on the ankle bone...not allowing the foot to rest on that side, etc. I had a compression sock that I wear on occasion when my foot is bothering me...but it was becoming threadbare....so am happy to have a new sock!
customer_reviews.author: Marilyn K. Geiger

customer_reviews.title: Good for daily activities as well as intense movements
customer_reviews.text: This sleeves work extremely well. Highly breathable with a strong support that I needed for dancing. Unlike other thicker compression supports, this one actually perform the best. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Ivyy

customer_reviews.title: I  have the small/medium size.  I wear a size 6 shoe and they fit perfectly.
customer_reviews.text: They are a little tight around the ball of the foot but not uncomfortable. The fit is good otherwise. They really help my ankle and arch from aching so much. Which is a good thing. I do have to take them off after a few hours so my feet can relax, but otherwise they seem to help. I also love the flesh color of the socks, not as noticeable ,that you're wearing them.
customer_reviews.author: JB Northern California

customer_reviews.title: You will never guess but it works to relieve foot pain
customer_reviews.text: I can't even imagine a tiny stocking would alleviate foot heel pain. But it does. I wear size 6 shoes and the small fits well. Not easy but not hard to put on. Wearing it overnight relieve heel pain in the morning. I have been wearing it for a week now and I would say the pain is about 15% of previous levels. I just ordered another pair.
customer_reviews.author: NJNY

customer_reviews.title: Wear sandals show off my pedicure
customer_reviews.text: I had to buy some from the Comfort Shoe store that were $50.00 due to the fact I have tendons in my right foot that have collapsed, they have really tough Arch Support, are good to wear for short walks, site seeing, along my support brace. I absolutely love these they give my foot enough support for around the house, driving and to and from appointments. I can wear sandals show off my pedicure, with these ankle supports My foot does not tire as fast. I can't wait to get another colour to match my pink sandals.
customer_reviews.author: Baijji

customer_reviews.title: Too tight on the ankles
customer_reviews.text: Bought s/m and they are super tight, so tight that after sleeping with them on, I still have marks around my ankles 3 hours after taking them off. Fit great in the foot area but further up not so much. I am 135 lbs regular built
customer_reviews.author: lonematthews

customer_reviews.title: Definitely helped with my foot paint
customer_reviews.text: I really needed something to help with my plantar fasciitis. I almost always am barefoot around the house, so wanted something to help when I was barefoot. When I first put them on, they felt great. Gave good support and compression. However, by the time evening came, and I had them about about 6 hrs, my feet were quite swollen. For me, they worked great relieving my foot pain as long as I only wore them for a few hours at a time.
customer_reviews.author: CarolZN

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I have several issues going on with my foot and I am in a walking cast for 30 days. However, the structure of those "boots" is not as snug as I need and walking in the boot occasionally causes more pain than walking without it. However, since wearing these compression socks along with boot has made a tremendous difference and I hardly have any pain at all. The sock seems to hold my foot in an improved position better than the boot alone. I like them so much, I ordered another pair.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: best I've found
customer_reviews.text: I've tried so many products...too hot, not enough support, too difficult to get on, etc. etc. But these are GREAT, and I love having 2---I only need for one ankle, but having 2 means I can wash one while wearing the other. They are easy to get on, provide the perfect amount of support, and I love that they are open-toed....plus they are perfect skin color for me, so I've been wearing with my Vionic flipflops. Between the support of this open-toe support sock, and the arch support of the Vionic flipflops, I'm enjoying summer in no pain!
customer_reviews.author: M. Roberts

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: I don’t have acute heel pain since I’ve started wearing these. I wear them all day every day but take them off at night. I still hobble first thing in the morning until I put them on. They are highly anti bacterial and have never been smelly. They fit easily with socks or tights to fit in all my shoes. And this nude color is hardly noticeable with sandals. They have definitely improved my quality of life!
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: Nice support for long drives
customer_reviews.text: These compression socks worked well for my 15 hour drive across the country. Minimized swelling in my foot. I also use them for airplane trips. The tan color is inconspicuous even in sandals. There is a bit of a seam issue near the little toe when you wear shoes. This merely requires a bit if adjustment. Good price for a nice compression sock.
customer_reviews.author: Elsie Tiger

customer_reviews.title: Works like a charm
customer_reviews.text: Great for minimizing swelling while recovering from achilles surgery. Provides support without bulk like the drugstore ankle supports. Beige is a nice unobtrusive nude for pale skin. I'm a 7.5-8 but purchased the small size which was a good call. I think the medium would have been too large to be as beneficial and might be problematic when putting on socks. Will probably order another pair in black.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable and effective treatment.
customer_reviews.text: I bought the recommended the recommended size for my wife and they are kind of tough to get on her feet, but once they're on they do a great job. Her feet were swollen and we saw a remarkable difference after the first time she wore them. She says they are comfortable. We highly recommend this seller and product! Got a very nice follow-up email from the seller as well making sure we were happy with the purchase. And we are!
customer_reviews.author: Rick Moore

customer_reviews.title: support for my ankle that was shattered years ago.
customer_reviews.text: I like the nude color and that it doesn't cover my toes so I can wear them with open toe shoes. I ordered the sm/med and I wear a size 7 shoe. It fits great. I made this determination after reading previous reviews. It would be very helpful if the web site noted what shoe size went with the listed sizes for sale. There is a lot of confusion about this issue.
customer_reviews.author: TN Blonde

customer_reviews.title: Good support
customer_reviews.text: Been having trouble with my ankle and I found wearing the Plantar Fasciitis Socks with arch support has helped keep my ankle stable as well as support my arch. It wears like a strong compression stocking, keeps my ankle warm (my pain flares up when it's cold) and gives me the support I need. Have washed them several times and line dry & they are still holding up quite nicely.
customer_reviews.author: Deanne L

customer_reviews.title: Great support and fit
customer_reviews.text: Wore these for the first time today and they really were comfortable. I sprained my ankle quite badly and these give just the extra support I need without cutting into my foot. I found I could wear them all day and my foot did not have any swelling. You get the tightness of a compression sock but they are not so difficult to get on as I have found with other brands. The fit was true to size.
customer_reviews.author: Mary E. Wagster

customer_reviews.title: these are nice and not thick
customer_reviews.text: these are nice and not thick, not thin, just right. I like the texture also, it looks like they are trouser socks. I am happy that these are sold in pair though I only need one for my left ankle, I have a spare when the other gets soiled. thank you! i use these socks to support my weak ankle and arch support as well. i highly recommend these socks because they have great support.
customer_reviews.author: LindaA

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: They feel funny not having any toes in the socks but only time will tell how they really work. I like these socks they are very comfortable, they do help make my heel feel better as long as I wear them.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia McCue-Genaw

customer_reviews.title: Not what I needed them for
customer_reviews.text: I thought I would try to use these socks at night to help with achy legs after standing all day on a concrete floor. Y foot cramped when I wore them and left my big toe joint feeling bruised. I think if I needed them for the prescribed use I might have better results. I know that they are well made and would be perfect for those for Plantar Fasciitis.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sorry, hat to return them.
customer_reviews.text: I have a narrow foot and wear a size 8 1/2 shoe. Loved the fabric, but way to small and so tight I couldn't get them on past my arch. Same problem with the pair I bought for my husband. Please put a size chart in your description that would help in choosing what size to buy.
customer_reviews.author: Love stone

customer_reviews.title: Help people who have pain in their arches
customer_reviews.text: Every part of our body is built for our ideal weight ... down to and including our feet. If your feet hurt under your arches, you could be over stretching them because of weight. This helps. I normally have very high arches, and insoles that pooch up under my arches just annoy me. This holds the arch itself higher because of the engineering.
customer_reviews.author: Dixie Reader

customer_reviews.title: I Can't Believe the Relief
customer_reviews.text: I just got these in and I have no idea how they are going to hold up but I have to tell you I haven't stopped moaning from the sheer relief. They are like a little miracle for my feet. Walking and just sitting feel so very much better. I am very happy with them and will have to order more as these are going to get dirty because I am never taking them off.
customer_reviews.author: Delilah Jenkins

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable, well made product
customer_reviews.text: The fit is excellent (sm/med size). The fabric has a nice feel, is very comfortable, and light weight. Just what I wanted. I washed by hand and it came out fine. I bought it for recovery from ankle surgery for a fractured ankle, however, so wish it came up just a little higher on the ankle. Other than that it is an excellent product and I would definitely recommend to others.
customer_reviews.author: GardenMN

customer_reviews.title: Some people may need to order a size up
customer_reviews.text: I order a s/m and a L/xl to try for size. The L fits me better. I didn't even try the S. I am a size 7-7.5 women. However I have high arch and chubby feet. So L is better. I wore it to bed and didn't feel too constricted. Gonna wear for the day and see how it goes. I do like it good enough to try it out. Now I just need to figure out how to return the S to the vendor.
customer_reviews.author: LW

customer_reviews.title: These work!
customer_reviews.text: I have used other socks for my heel spur but found they were uncomfortable or just ugly!! I like these because they work and they look good with sandals and shoes. Additionally, I can sleep in them without waking up during the night frantically having to remove them because they cut off my circulation. I wear a size 6 shoe and they are fine. If your foot is wide you might want to up a size.
customer_reviews.author: FLA2600

customer_reviews.title: hurts around the ankles
customer_reviews.text: I'm a size 6 and the small/medium fit fine. However, when wearing them all day, my ankles became sore, like they were bruised. No visible bruise, but very sore. I am not overweight so my ankles are not very wide. I purchased the four pack for the discount and I am now stuck with three pairs that I will not wear.
customer_reviews.author: LJ

customer_reviews.title: Really happy and will buy more
customer_reviews.text: I was excited to find these in beige, since usually they are black and more conspicuous. My shoe size is 7 1/2 and I bought the small. They fit great. Remember, you want them tight or they do not do any good. Received a follow-up email from the seller, just wanting to ensure that I was satisfied. I think this is a very good value and I will buy more.
customer_reviews.author: M. Marks

customer_reviews.title: Great price and quality
customer_reviews.text: I recently helped my Aunt shop for and buy these plantar fasciitis socks after her doctor recommended Amazon. We decided to go with your socks because you sold a pair instead of just one, and the price was so much lower than others. She LOVES them! Her doctor feels the pustular psoriasis on her feet has gotten in to her tendons causing a lot of pain. Your socks have helped tremendously, THANK YOU!!
customer_reviews.author: harley08

customer_reviews.title: Great pair of socks and perfect price!
customer_reviews.text: So far these socks have started to help. I have never worn compression socks before so it’s a change. They are colored so good to my skin tone that I could get away with wearing them to work with flip flops if I needed to. They are super comfortable. I highly recommend these if you have foot pain or arch troubles.
customer_reviews.author: Shanna Britt

customer_reviews.title: Tight on the ankle
customer_reviews.text: There are very tight. They cut off circulation on my ankle. I can only wear them for a short time. The other people that said they did not cut off circulation must have very skinny ankles. My one ankle swells very easily so it will gets uncomfortable on that one more than my right ankle. Seems to be good for support though.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon J. Palmer

customer_reviews.title: Maybe not for pregnant women.
customer_reviews.text: I’m 6 months pregnant and I bought these to help with my job. I’m a phlebotomist in a hospital and I’m on my feet drawing blood for house on end. I wear a size 7 so I bought a small, but after wearing these socks a whole shift my feet felt like they were going to fall off. Didn’t see any relief. I bought the L/XL and the pain is better but there’s still pain. I would recommend a knee high compression the covers toes fully. These socks would slide and fold when putting socks over top of them.
customer_reviews.author: tasanti

customer_reviews.title: the best product for plantar fascitis
customer_reviews.text: Having plantar fasciitis for years, I have suffered much and used many products to relieve my pain. The first day I wore these socks, my pain went away. It is a constant in my wardrobe now but after wearing the sock for several months, I can go days without wearing it and I do not have pain.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: the bands at the top are SO small and tight ...
customer_reviews.text: the bands at the top are SO small and tight that they cut-off all circulation right above my ankles! Not sure why they have to be so small or at least don't come in choices/sizes (I realize the foot portion has sizes)?
customer_reviews.author: Cheri Newman

customer_reviews.title: If you have high instep or arch maybe order one size bigger..Great support
customer_reviews.text: Love how these socks make my plantar fasciitis feel so much better. I think they are a little too tight so I only wear them for a few hours at a time. But they really help when playing sports or dancing to give extra support. I figure they will loosen up with use. It is a fine product .. Good service
customer_reviews.author: dancing queen

customer_reviews.title: Very Pleased
customer_reviews.text: I ordered two as I have tried wearing these at night to help with my foot pain. I noticed a bid difference when I get up. I have less pain and swelling. I work standing all day so this is a relief.. Last night I needed to take them off about 3:00am as I was having a bit of pain... I think it just may be an adjustment period...I feel they are helping a great deal
customer_reviews.author: Teri J.

customer_reviews.title: It does work!
customer_reviews.text: I have suffered with intense pain from plantar fasciitis and nothing helped. I literally took to wrapping my foot/heel/ankle with an ace bandage and then an ankle/foot brace on top of that. It wasn't great but helped...until I stumbled upon these. I am walking again with no pain! I will definitely continue to purchase as needed. I am so happy to have found this product.
customer_reviews.author: Karen D. Masters

customer_reviews.title: Runs really small
customer_reviews.text: Ordered a XL, but received a S/M. These are really tight, and I ordered them for swelling, rather than PF. Can only wear them for about an hour before they are cutting off circulation to feet. Recommend you order as big as possible to be able to wear them comfortably for support.
customer_reviews.author: TechyLala

customer_reviews.title: They feel like nothing on your feet
customer_reviews.text: I'm so happy to find those socks, my left foot was always swollen, Dr said to get support socks, I was not very happy then I found in these and I just love them, they feel like I have nothing on, they help, I can even were them with sandals
customer_reviews.author: Henriette

customer_reviews.title: Gentle Effective Compression
customer_reviews.text: Bought these socks to help with support and swelling caused by arthritis in my ankles. I am very happy with them compared to another pair I previously purchased at a higher price elsewhere. They are comfortable and easy to put on and remove.
customer_reviews.author: Madeline Eckenrode

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful support and pain relief
customer_reviews.text: I had no idea compression socks would make such a huge difference in relieving my foot pain! These are great. They do not pinch, roll, or dig in. They support and feel amazing. I love them so much, I’ve purchase more. I do wish they could just go in regular laundry - air dry is required
customer_reviews.author: Allison Tanaka

customer_reviews.title: Perfect support
customer_reviews.text: I love that these socks are toeless and that they are a nude color On my right foot my tendon is trying to get sawed into because of my heel and the right heel is just beginning The sock are not so tight that they leave marks on my ankles and the support is great I have been wearing them everyday I don’t put them in the dryer but they air dry quickly And last but not least that are affordable
customer_reviews.author: mimi

customer_reviews.title: Very helpful
customer_reviews.text: Excellent communication with this seller. Product helps me a lot to walk until my doctor appointment. I wear a size 7R and the s/m fits well. At first the end bands were too snug, but either they've stretched or I've gotten used to it. I ordered another pair.
customer_reviews.author: Gail

customer_reviews.title: Great for my ankle pain
customer_reviews.text: I have had sore and swollen ankles for a number of months. The inserts my podiatrist recommended helped, but my ankles were still sore. Since wearing these compression socks, my ankles are not as swollen or sore. I am very pleased with this purchase and would use this seller again.
customer_reviews.author: galaxylvr

customer_reviews.title: Did not help relieve pain
customer_reviews.text: They are supportive but way tighter than I expected. They did nothing to help my plantar fasciitis pain. Would not suggest for that but they might help with something else.
customer_reviews.author: amlarivs

customer_reviews.title: They are perfect!
customer_reviews.text: This are amazing got myself an small and they are just perfect. I’m glad I went for this one instead of paying double for other ones advertised. Very fast delivery.
customer_reviews.author: Acar.e

customer_reviews.title: Pain relief
customer_reviews.text: Bought for 12 year old ballerina with arch pain. Seemed to help. But be careful. Dogs think they are great chew toys with the foot smell. Oops.
customer_reviews.author: Laura, the Mainah

customer_reviews.title: So tight! that was torture
customer_reviews.text: Too too too tight Hard to put on Hard to take off I struggled They killed my feet I had to take them off after an hour
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Too tight, but not enough support
customer_reviews.text: I'm subject to swelling in my ankles. Bought this for the compression. Well, it does compress. It compressed so much I had deep gouges in my legs from the pinch. Not too thrilled.
customer_reviews.author: DannyJane

customer_reviews.title: immediate pain relief
customer_reviews.text: I suddenly experienced awful pains in the heel of my left foot which not only throbbed but prevented me from walking! After slipping on the sock I felt an immediate relief. I am using them on both feet now and will definitely purchase other colors.
customer_reviews.author: avidreader

customer_reviews.title: Not too tight. Can wear for longer than other wraps
customer_reviews.text: Had problems with an ankle after a fall. These worked like a charm to keep the swelling down. Not too tight and wash up well.
customer_reviews.author: Chamele

customer_reviews.title: fantastic support and pain relief
customer_reviews.text: The best relief I have found! Comfortable and low profile, not bulky like some of the others.The socks come over the ankle like a typical athletic sock. If you have any ankle swelling, get higher socks as they will cut into your ankles - or wear them for shorter periods rather than all day.
customer_reviews.author: Pickey Consumer

customer_reviews.title: Support sock
customer_reviews.text: I’m sorry to tell you that they just didn’t work for me. It’s probably just me. I thank you for all you did for me. I’m sure they are great for those who don’t have the problems I have.
customer_reviews.author: Donna J Lee

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit and not rise
customer_reviews.text: Actually don’t have plantar fasciitis. Have been using these to wrap a foot that is only six months healed from a break so I can keep running. This works wonderfully. Tight fit but not so tight that it’s uncomfortable. The socks stay put, even while running. So glad I bought these.
customer_reviews.author: Richmond12

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit - Great sock
customer_reviews.text: I really like this compression socks; for someone who had to be in a cast for 8 weeks to get rid of the Plantar Fasciitis, i do everything possible to prevent a recurrence, and my feet do not feel tired or sore after use... ordering another pair.
customer_reviews.author: BoogiesMom13

customer_reviews.title: No more heel pain!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these because I was having heel pain/plantar fasciitis. Wore them for a couple of weeks and the pain is gone.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn Hancock

customer_reviews.title: Best relief for plantar fasciitis!
customer_reviews.text: So comfortable they can be worn 24/7. Color blends so well I don’t mind wearing them out in public. Excellent customer service. Very happy to recommend this company to others!
customer_reviews.author: Judy Gardner

customer_reviews.title: Ahhh. Feels good.
customer_reviews.text: I just received them. I ordered a s/m size. I wear a 4-5 in shoes. They are very tight and am unsure what the fit will be when my ankles swell. I will say in the 10 minutes I’ve had them on, my feet feel better already.
customer_reviews.author: Auti

customer_reviews.title: So so
customer_reviews.text: Eh, have use these types of things before and worked wonders. These , I haven’t noticed any relief. And look like old compression hose with a weird texture.
customer_reviews.author: M Thomason

customer_reviews.title: Great Support
customer_reviews.text: Truly helps in supporting my ankle and reducing the swelling resulting from tendonitis. Very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great compression but way to tight at band around ankle
customer_reviews.text: Reviews said this was light compression, I wear size 5.5 shoe, I loved the compression on my foot, but the band around my ankle was so tight it cut off the circulation in just a few minutes. The band around the toes was also tight
customer_reviews.author: Briggie

customer_reviews.title: Good support
customer_reviews.text: So far so good...the only reason for a 4 on pain relief is because I’m dealing with plantar fasciitis which is so painful that the pain never fully dissipates....
customer_reviews.author: J. R. Gordon

customer_reviews.title: Best unobtrusive ankle compression
customer_reviews.text: These are the best of this type of ankle sleeve. Fit well, compression holds up all day, and the beige is very unobtrusive if you’re have blindingly pale legs which is nice if you want to wear open shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa C.

customer_reviews.title: Best sock ever for arch pain
customer_reviews.text: Love these. Bought two pair! I’ve been having arch pain and it kills to walk. I feel like I have a marble under each arch. After reviewing .. bought these and now I can’t go a day without them. Great for the money and fits like a sock!
customer_reviews.author: Sumaya Candy

customer_reviews.title: A MUST HAVE if you’re on your feet.
customer_reviews.text: If you work in the service industry or on your feet for long hours, buy these. I put these on during my shirt shifts. After long shifts I put them on when I get home and by the time I wake up, my feet are as good as new!
customer_reviews.author: Ally

customer_reviews.title: Perefect fit
customer_reviews.text: So they sent me a larger sz and it fits perfectly!!! Thank you. I would definitely purchase from you again.. you guys took the time to make sure my purchase was right for me. I needed arch support and this product is perfect. Thanks again
customer_reviews.author: Molly OConnell

customer_reviews.title: Most Excellent
customer_reviews.text: These saved my life... had just gotten planters fasciitis; ordered these and I was able to walk much easier! A Godsend!
customer_reviews.author: E. M. Lauinger

customer_reviews.title: work great!
customer_reviews.text: I have heel spurs among other foot problems and I was not sure if these would do anything for me. They are amazing! my feet feel energized when i am wearing these, i love them and will most likely get more. If you have any kind of foot problems you should try them.
customer_reviews.author: Patty (Tennessee)

customer_reviews.title: easy to use
customer_reviews.text: this product does just as it was advertised and is also easy to put on and take off as opposed to 'others'. It also gives great support to the feet.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel W. Fahl

customer_reviews.title: They really work!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my 12 year old who has plantar fasciitis. We have tried so many things and these socks actually helped. I am so grateful to find them. She was in pain everyday until she started wearing these. They are worth every penny!
customer_reviews.author: LCampbell

customer_reviews.title: Provides support and reduces swelling post operative
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for for my feet after having bunion and metatarsal surgery to reduce swelling and provide support. They work great and are a cooler option than the compression socks prescribed by the podiatrist. They can eve be worn with a sandal.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No more pain!
customer_reviews.text: I really like these compression socks for multiple reasons. They provide comfort. They blend in with my skin color so you don't notice them. I use these with arch support in my shoes, and I don't have pain anymore! I wear them every day and am completely happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: jordena

customer_reviews.title: Good for night time, not so much for walking
customer_reviews.text: Product looks as shown, but the ankle rolls down and the toe area bunches up when you walk. Works well if you are just sleeping in them.
customer_reviews.author: Mae Best

customer_reviews.title: I recommend it for a variety of foot issues
customer_reviews.text: I have a dislocated joint in my foot which has resulted in arthritis and a collapsing arch. This sock provides the additional support needed in my foot to minimize the pain. It's very light weight but snug enough to provide the support needed. I recommend it for a variety of foot issues.
customer_reviews.author: LindaL

customer_reviews.title: I'm glad I tried them and wear them just about every ...
customer_reviews.text: I don't have the heel pain which I understand is the predominant issue of the Plantar Fascitis diagnosis. These are actually helping my pain which has been coming to my arch area up into my toes. I'm glad I tried them and wear them just about every day!.
customer_reviews.author: Meg

customer_reviews.title: Great Support
customer_reviews.text: I work in a fast-paced kitchen and I am on my feet for hours at a time. I think these socks have greatly helped my arches not to hurt and my feet feel so much better. They do not swell anymore and they feel great. I give it four stars because my heels have started hurting with the prolonged wearing of these socks. However, When I wear them for less than 6 hours at a time, they are awesome. I just don't think they were meant to be worn for 10 to 12 hours.
customer_reviews.author: Angie from Oklahoma

customer_reviews.title: Feel Great
customer_reviews.text: They feel great. With the light color, they blend and I can wear they with sandals without looking like a dork!
customer_reviews.author: Pat H

customer_reviews.title: Love them
customer_reviews.text: Love them , I work at the intensive care unit in a hospital and I’m walking All day and I’m a heavy person so this has made my pain go away
customer_reviews.author: America

customer_reviews.title: Did not relieve pain
customer_reviews.text: They were snug and in that way supported the arch. But the orthotics that have cushion or firm arch seem to relieve the pain a lot more than the socks
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: Very helpful!
customer_reviews.text: The "socks" are quite tight but that is the whole point. Once you have them on they are fine. I noticed a big improvement in the pain and swelling when I wore them to work. Very good arch support and ankle support. I would definitely recommend these to anyone with plantar fasciitis.
customer_reviews.author: KHalliday

customer_reviews.title: Can’t be washed
customer_reviews.text: At first these were great, wore them all day at work to keep my feet from swelling. After a week I washed and hang-dried them, regardless, they shrunk and now I can’t even get them on.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney Clyde

customer_reviews.title: Finally a nude color plantar fascitis sock you can wear to the office without covering it!
customer_reviews.text: These are very nicely made and a huge relief for my plantar fascitis. Game changer! Only ones I could find that didn't have hugely noticeable brand names plastered across them or humongous logos. Perfect nude color to wear with office shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Faye

customer_reviews.title: Too long for my feet
customer_reviews.text: I returned these because they did not fit my feet properly. The foot section is rather long - it fell halfway across my toes and squished them. Too bad, because it is hard to find these in nude color.
customer_reviews.author: shoeless

customer_reviews.title: Wish they would have helped!
customer_reviews.text: Nice dealing with the company but the sox did not help my feet. They cut off the circulation to my toes which did not help with foot discomfort. I kept the pair I wore but returned the extra unworn pair and also the little arch support. Wish they would have helped.
customer_reviews.author: C. Moore

customer_reviews.title: Daughter loves these!
customer_reviews.text: Daughter loves these socks. She’s a competitive ballroom dancer and needs to make sure her feet are properly maintained. Will buy some for me and hubby to see if they work for us as well,
customer_reviews.author: Ami

customer_reviews.title: Great socks
customer_reviews.text: These socks are great. Just spent a few days at Disneyland ( with a lot of walking). The socks kept my foot in alignment and they were easy to wash and drip dry for the next day.
customer_reviews.author: Lori O'Keefe

customer_reviews.title: Satisifed
customer_reviews.text: Overall I believe they are helping. Thin, neutral color makes them almost unnoticeable. Haven't washed them yet so I'm curious to see how they hold up. Hoping this will help, much better than taping my foot with sports tape.
customer_reviews.author: Marjorie

customer_reviews.title: Works well, Would recommend
customer_reviews.text: These aren't as snug fitting as another pair purchased through Amazon. I find them more comfortable on days that include sitting or driving.
customer_reviews.author: Sage

customer_reviews.title: A little tighter than expected. My mother wears a ...
customer_reviews.text: A little tighter than expected. My mother wears a size 8 shoe. I didn’t even think to put it on her. I wear a size 9 and tried them on. It was way too tight for me. The size was s/m.
customer_reviews.author: C L Power

customer_reviews.title: Best purchase ever!
customer_reviews.text: I’m pregnant and have terrible vericose veins and spider veins in my ankles and legs. My ankles would swell up and sting if I was on my feet for longer than 5 minutes. Then I found these compression socks and they changed everything! All of the pain in my ankles goes away while wearing them! And the socks are light and breathable and can be worn with sandals. Perfect for pregnant women who are hot all the time and have swollen feet! I highly recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Runs extremely small!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered my size but they were so tight I could barely get them on and removing them was awful!
customer_reviews.author: Barb S.

product_meta.title: Plantar Fasciitis Socks with Arch Support for Men & Women - Best Ankle Compression Socks for Foot and Heel Pain Relief - Better Than Night Splint Brace, Orthotics, Inserts, Insoles
product_meta.description:
RECOVER FASTER, IMPROVE MOBILITY, RELIEVE PAIN, FEEL GREAT

- Feel The Difference Immediately! - 

Crucial Compression Plantar Fasciitis Socks provide you with comfortable support, where you need it most. Ultra comfortable, breathable and flexible. You may even forget you're wearing them - but your feet, arches, heels, and ankles won't.

- Don't Let Foot Pain Stop You From Being Active - 

Take advantage of modern sport technology. Now you can perform better with the same compression technology worn by professional athletes and runners.

Don't let your pain hold you back. Slide your foot in for instant support and snug compression for your plantar fasciitis, achilles tendon, ankle, heel, arch, and foot pain.

Painful and injured feet need extra love. Utilize premium compression help to speed up your recovery.

Who Can Benefit?
- Great for running, jogging, hiking, cycling, walking, physically demanding jobs
- Extra support while playing tennis, volleyball, golf, and fitness workouts at the gym
- Boost circulation to reduce fatigue while standing on your feet
- And more!

Made from Premium Quality Lycra (80% Nylon and 20% Spandex)

BONUS! Order now and for a limited time get our "Top 10 Exercises to Prevent Plantar Fasciitis" eBook, FREE

CLICK TO ADD TO CART NOW!

100% MONEY BACK GUARANTEE
If for any reason you are unsatisfied, just email us stating the reason you are unhappy, and you will receive a courteous and prompt refund within 24 hours. It's that simple.

Don't go another day without experiencing the countless benefits of premium compression!
feature_bullets: INSTANT SUPPORT AND PAIN RELIEF - You will feel the difference immediately. Professional-grade foot compression sleeves for fast relief of throbbing pain. Our Power Support technology provides targeted foot, heel, arch and ankle support in all the right places - without restricting your motion. Stop suffering and start feeling better with improved circulation to reduce swelling. Walk or run freely with our compression socks for plantar fasciitis. Your feet deserve it!

#1 RECOMMENDED DESIGN - Why settle for anything less than the best? With unmatched quality lycra and long-lasting durability, our foot compression socks will take you wherever you need to go in style - we guarantee it. Targeted arch support stabilizes your plantar fascia ligament. Reinforced, shock absorbing heel and ankle cushion relieves heel spurs. Balanced compression reduces inflammation. Get the support you need while you're at work, running, or enjoying a nature hike.

ULTRA COMFORTABLE - Some plantar fasciitis socks are too hot, too tight, or too bulky. Our Premium ComfortFlex design is carefully constructed with quality stitching to provide a lightweight, breathable fit without cutting off circulation or restricting your movement. Easy to slip on with moisture wicking fabric will keep your feet dry, so you can wear all day with sandals, slippers, under socks, shoes, insoles, inserts, splint supports, orthotics, or orthopedic shoes.

WALK, WORK, OR RUN IN COMFORT - Proven to benefit men and women who need day or night relief for plantar fasciitis support, arthritis pain, arch, heel, ankle brace. Wear daily for gentle, consistent compression or just when you need a little extra performance support for your feet and ankles. Grab a few pairs and get back your freedom. Perfect for running, walking, exercise, hiking, basketball, golf, tennis, work and more!

100% "PERFECT FIT" GUARANTEE - Your health and comfort is our passion! Use our size chart to choose the best fit for you. If you are not completely satisfied with your compression socks, return them for a full refund or replacement. No questions asked. We stand behind the quality of our products with excellent customer care and are confident you will LOVE your foot compression sleeves.
